Sometimes. l mean...
if the mood strikes.

[laughing]

What's your name?

l'm Beth.
Andy.
Andy.

okay, Andy?
l wont.

Unless you want
to be told on...
Beth.
Wow. That totally worked!

l literally said nothing.
And she found me fascinating.

l would've thought
you were doing that for years.

Should l have asked her out?
No. That's the key.

i agree with you that the presures for having sex are one of the lower

your passions and not to jepordize your identity for the sake of social 
pressure. and as a whole the movie acts as a parody of our hypersexualized 
society, each character offers a comentary on our relationships. this 
retarded film is deeper than face value. be happy, thats the point!
